Body:
ref_DRATS = old_div(1.0, 7.0) * 100.0
ref_DRATS_prime = old_div(5.0, 7.0) * 100.0
end = 4
DRATS, DRATS_prime = lib_ptrm.get_DRATS(self.ref_sum_ptrm_check, self.
    ref_sum_abs_ptrm_check, self.x_Arai, end)
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_DRATS, DRATS)
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_DRATS_prime, DRATS_prime)
